CustomField.formula: ( YEAR(TODAY()) - ( IF( VALUE(RIGHT(Birthday__c, 2)) <= VALUE(RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())), 2)), 2000, 1900 ) + VALUE(RIGHT(Birthday__c, 2)) ) ) - IF( (MONTH(TODAY()) * 100 + DAY(TODAY())) < (VALUE(MID(Birthday__c, 3, 2)) * 100 + VALUE(LEFT(Birthday__c, 2))), 1, 0 )
CustomField.label: Age
